text: the required files are `config.md` and `index.md` (provided you don't do a custom landing page) as well as the folders that start with `_` . You can remove the rest. If your `__site` folder is "polluted" you can do `serve(clear=true)` which will remove it first then re-build it (you can also safely just manually delete it, it's the same thing)

text:
right so the full list of necessary stuff is:

• `_assets` not necessary but you typically want it for things like images etc
• `_layout` necessary (specifically you must have a `head.html`, `foot.html` and `page_foot.html` (the last one can be empty but must be there)
• `_css` not necessary but typically good to place your style files
• `_libs` not necessary but typically good for any JS
• `__site` generated (can be gitignored if you deploy with github)
• `index.md` or `index.html` required = landing page
• `config.md` required = general page variables for the site
• `utils.jl` not required but needed for hfuns and julia-based customisations
• `CNAME` not required but useful if you want to deploy to `<http://oxinabox.au|oxinabox.au>`
